mdRecord.dcterms:title: Untitled [Dining Room]
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Jarvis, J. F. (John Fillis), 1849-1931
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Stereoscopic view of the southeast corner of the dining room at Mount Vernon including the fireplace, c. 1870. Photographic print on stereocard. Mounted on yellow board. Printed text on front of the cardboard mount reads: J. F. Jarvis' Stereoscopic Views. 135 Pa. Ave. Washington, D. C. Note - on the reverse, the accession is mismarked as RP-6 and should read RP-7.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
George Washington's Mount Vernon
